Yesterday, Yatai coach before the official announcement and Sainty, Bosnia-Herzegovina coach Dragan coaching contract was signed. The two sides signed the 11 contracts before the season Dragan Should Yatai into the league with eight sides automatically renewed for one year.Last week, due to the continued downturn in the team record, Yatai team coach Sabrina Leach any of the first 15 class. Dragan After the second day as the most important spare tire flew to Changchun Yatai negotiate contracts. Successful negotiations, formally signed yesterday. Dragan is not the first super "fire", in 2011, invited Sainty team on the verge of relegation stage Dragan, Dragan was the team into the lead four, unanimously approved by the technical and tactical ability. But after two seasons coaching Sainty, a last resort because of the multi-class contradictions.Yatai is also in urgent need of

such a super familiar, popular recognition handsome, hit it off, first signed a one-year contract. By the end of the season, can be led into the league if Dragan before 8, then both sides of the contract will be automatically extended to the end of 2015. But this year's lineup Yatai, the former eight some difficulty. Dragan his inaugural speech, "invited Yatai too fast, and I became from a trip to re-work the league has started almost two months, and suddenly the results are not ideal coaching a team, which not a good start, but I'm looking forward to this new challenge, I want the team to play good football. " nike free 4.0 v2 for sale Yesterday afternoon, Dragan it rushed to meet with the players, led training yesterday, the FIFA delegation headed by FIFA Development Officers Sairui Er six-member delegation led once again came to the Chinese Football Association, to continue negotiations in 2014 on China Football's "assistance program."In 2010, FIFA began aid Chinese football. The latest issue of the cooperation agreement was signed in June 2013, when the Chinese Football Association to get the full support of FIFA on seven areas totaling 34 projects. Football Association vice chairman Zhang Jian in yesterday's talks also mentioned the results from the FIFA assistance, "starting in 2010, the Chinese Football Association and FIFA to organize various training 107 staff, trainees up to 7115 people.For example, through cooperation, the association has trained 40 local coaches outstanding keynote lecturer, lecturer in six AFC elite, FIFA instructor a person. Group

of lecturers organized various training courses in the past 260 years, training coaches 5710 people. "Zhang Jian continue to apply for "aid" to FIFA, the "last hope on the basis of cooperation, the two sides can achieve better results in terms of technology, the referee, youth training, FIFA can provide tailored cooperation projects in China so that more realistic training of Chinese football. " FIFA also gave a positive response within the next two days the two sides will cooperate to determine the content of the coming year. In two days, the National Youth team will end a 12-day training base in Xianghe conducted. National Youth team coach Xiong is stepping up its familiar "to communicate with the nike free 4.0 v3 shoes players, micro-channel network video had to spend."Earlier this year the National Youth Team led by the Li Bing, but in the finals from Yaqingsai only five months, the Football Association chicken coaching change, the former coach Xiong Thatcher took over the team. Considering the time constraints, Xiong deliberately shouted to the old Bayi Iron Guard Liu Junwei responsible for defense training, Li Sheng microblogging coach is responsible for the attack training. Xiong also four players and inspection and 12th of this month organized the first national youth team training camp. Xiong introduces the team preparing for the case, the "training period is mainly domestic players running, the next phase will focus on study abroad to Portugal football player. Coaching staff hopes to be able to identify two of the training game, learn a lot of overseas players , the coaching staff and even online video, micro-channel has to spend, accelerate and players familiar with each other.
